headline: PTC Therapeutics Provides Corporate Update and Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: PTC Therapeutics, Inc., (NASDAQ: PTCT) today announced a corporate update and financial results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025.
